name: The Run of Spirits
description:
Players assume control of spirits, a girl and a wolf, which have to jump over bushes, stumps and traps. They can also control a seal spirit, which explores another level of the game and dodges sea creatures and corals.

★ Choose your spirit

★ Run or swim and try to survive as long as possible

★ Compete with your friends online

★ Take first place in TRoS ranking list

★ Collect Stone Spirits

★ Buy and paint new skins

★ Play offline when you off the internet

★ Enjoy the world of the game

All saves are local and disappear after you delete the app.
